hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc.Header
      • hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc.Bomb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Bomb
extends Header
implements java.io.Serializable

    C <=> S

    Bomb is sent from the client to the server, when the user places a bomb. The server stores the bomb in his model, and a timer triggers when it explodes and ObjectDestroyed and/or UserDead. The explosion range is calculated on every client itself. The server forwards this message to the other clients, so they can display the bomb.
    Author:
    Marco Egger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int userID,
    Bomb.BombType bombType,
    java.awt.Point position)
        Creates a bomb instance with given parameters. The random time is calculated automatically.
        Parameters:
        userID - of the user who placed the bomb
        bombID - unique to identify the bomb
        position - of the bomb
        time - until bomb explode, random between 2-3 seconds
